title: PaperKit Tool Definition Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating PaperKit tool metadata definitions

description.description: Detailed description of what the tool does

version.description: Semantic version of the tool definition

path.description: Path to tool executable or script

requiresConsent.description: Whether the tool requires explicit user consent before execution

capabilities.description: List of tool capabilities and features

constraints.description: List of tool constraints and limitations

dependencies.description: List of external dependencies required by this tool

inputSchema.description: JSON Schema for expected input format

outputSchema.description: JSON Schema for expected output format

exampleUsage.description: Example command lines or usage patterns

owner.description: Team or person responsible for maintaining this tool
